headline: Warren Buffett Owns Chevron and Occidental. Should You Buy This Energy Giant Instead?
summary: Warren Buffett's investment decisions at Berkshire Hathaway are watched closely on Wall Street.  Buffett owns Chevron and Occidental Petroleum, and he has also made a material investment in electricity companies.  Investors can buy this one energy giant that will give them exposure to both oil and electricity.

headline: The Best Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy With $1,000 Right Now
summary: All of Berkshire Hathaway's holdings have their bullish arguments, but three of them are particularly strong arguments right now.
